name: Firelight Pyrodancer
text: You can Ritual Summon this card with a "Firelight'' card. You can only use each of the following effects of ''Firelight Pyrodancer'' once per turn. If this card is Special Summoned: You can return 1 other "Firelight'' monster you control to the hand, and place 1 Pendulum monster from your Deck in your Pendulum Zone. If this card is destroyed by a card effect: You can add 1 "Firelight'' monster with a different Pendulum Scale than this card from your Deck to your hand.
pendulum_text: During your Main Phase: You can Ritual Summon 1 Level 4 "Firelight" monster from your hand or face-up Extra Deck, then destroy this card. You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Firelight" monsters. This effect cannot be negated.
